trans-unit.source: Describes the area of the designer that contains the point passed to a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest(System.Drawing.Point)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 描述包含传递到 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest(System.Drawing.Point)" /> 方法的点的设计器区域。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> is used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> methods to describe the area of the designer hit by mouse clicks and drag and drop operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> 方法使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> 来描述鼠标单击操作和拖放操作所点击的设计器区域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> to decide what kind of action to take in response to a successful hit test.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations> 可以决定在点击测试成功后执行何种操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> 类的基于设计器的中断来添加新的分支。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> returns `true`, a new branch is created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> 返回 `true`，则使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> 方法创建一个新分支。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> object is created as a parameter to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method using the location of the workflow designer by specifying the Designer flag.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo>对象创建作为参数传递给<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A>方法通过指定设计器标志中使用工作流设计器的位置。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 创建完成后，可使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> 方法来确保新添加的分支显示在工作流设计器中。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the area contained by the expand button was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了展开按钮包含的区域。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the bottom of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了设计器的底部。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a connector on the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了设计器上的连接器。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that any part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了设计器的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the left part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了设计器的左侧。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示未点击设计器的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the right part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了设计器的右侧。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the top of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 指示点击了设计器的顶部。
